definition: wuling powder (decoction of poria mushroom used in TCM)/poria five powder/Hoelen five powder/five ling powder
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: Conclusion Yinchen-Wuling powder can effectively prevent and cure alcoholic liver injury of rats.
sentences.chinese: 结论茵陈五苓散能有效预防和治疗大鼠酒精性肝损伤。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Wulingsan on chronic heart failure(CHF).
sentences.chinese: 目的观察五苓散加减治疗充血性心力衰竭的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Objective: To study changes in hemodynamics of milrinon inhalation treatment congestive heart failure(CHF) rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察五苓散加减治疗充血性心力衰竭的临床疗效。

definition: superficial syndrome/illness that has not attacked the vital organs of the human body
illness having to do with obstruction of urine flow/(Chinese medicine)/retention of urine
common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
interpretation of the cause/onset and process of an illness/pathogenesis
